definitions: the action of examining something again or further

examples.text: a country with a past that requires re-examination
the department had undertaken a re-examination of its role

shortDefinitions: action of examining something again or further

definitions: the process of questioning one's own witness again, after cross-examination by the opposing counsel

examples.text: advocates questioned the manner in which the re-examination of witnesses has been conducted

shortDefinitions: process of questioning one's own witness again
